Package socialmedia

Class Platform

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Platform
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Platform is the serializable class that is used by the SocialMedia class to save and load the social media platform.
See Also:
